metadata.description: The base URL of the Azure Resource Manager template repository.
The custom fully qualified domain name for this moodle instance.
The password to use in order to manage the database server.
The username to use in order to manage the database server.
The database backup retention period in days.
The number of vCPUs allocated to the database.
The Moodle application database account password.
The Moodle application database account username.
The size of data storage allocated to the database in MB.
The size of the Moodle Data Disk in giga bytes.
The name of the provisioned environment. Used to build resource names.
The public URI to raw version of the project repository files.
The URI of the SSL Certificate Secret used by the Application Gateway.
The User Identity assigned to the Application Gateway to get the SSL Certificate Secret.
The name of the Azure Location where resources will be created.
The email address of the Moodle Administrator.
The password the Moodle Administrator account.
The username of the Moodle Administrator account.
The Moodle upgrade key.

The short name of the project. This string will be used to name all resources required. It must only contain letters (a-z,A-Z), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) characters, and must not exceed 13 characters in lenght.
Additional tags to add to each resource created.
The fully qualified domain name of the email server to use.
The SMTP server port.
The private IP address of the email server to use.
Optional tags specific to Virtual Machines.
The virtual network IP address prefix. Format is '255.255.255'.
The Web server administrator's email address.
The Web server administrator's password.
The Web server administrator's username.
The Web server automatic reboot time in UTC. Format: 'HH:MM'

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sudo ./setup_web_server', ' --data_disk_size ', parameters('dataDiskSizeGB'), 'G', ' --db_server_admin_password ', parameters('databaseAdminPassword'), ' --db_server_admin_username ', parameters('databaseAdminUsername'), ' --db_server_fqdn ', reference(variables('databaseName')).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ' --db_server_name ', variables('databaseName'), ' --moodle_admin_email ', parameters('moodleAdminEmail'), ' --moodle_admin_password ', parameters('moodleAdminPassword'),' --moodle_admin_username ', parameters('moodleAdminUsername'),' --moodle_data_mount_point_path ', variables('moodleDataMountPointPath'),' --moodle_db_name ', variables('databaseApplicationDatabaseName'),' --moodle_db_password ', parameters('databaseMoodlePassword'),' --moodle_db_username ', parameters('databaseMoodleUsername'),' --moodle_upgrade_key ', parameters('moodleUpgradeKey'),' --smtp_server_fqdn ', parameters('smtpServerFqdn'),' --smtp_server_port ' , parameters('smtpServerPort'),' --smtp_server_private_ip ', parameters('smtpServerPrivateIp'),' --web_server_admin_email ', parameters('webServerAdminEmail'),' --web_server_fqdn ', if(empty(parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), reference(variables('gatewayPublicIpName')).dnsSettings.fqdn, parameters('customApplicationFqdn')), ' --web_server_reboot_utc_time ', parameters('webServerRebootUtcTime'), ' --web_server_resource_name ', variables('webServerVirtualMachineName'), ' > /var/log/setup_web_server.log 2>&1')]
